name: NYC Health + Hospitals
authorizing_authority: NYC Charter § 2203; Health and Hospitals Corporation Act of 1969
appointments_summary: President and CEO selected by Board of Directors.
governance_structure: NYC Health + Hospitals operates under oversight of its Board of Directors (see NYC_GOID_BOD_001).

name: NYC Health + Hospitals Board of Directors
name_alphabetized: Health + Hospitals Board of Directors NYC
appointments_summary: Board consists of 17 members: 11 appointed by Mayor, 3 by Borough Presidents, 3 by Comptroller. Chair selected by Board.
governance_structure: Board of Directors for NYC Health + Hospitals; governs H+H system and selects President and CEO.

name: Metropolitan Transportation Authority
authorizing_authority: New York State Public Authorities Law § 1260
appointments_summary: Chair and CEO appointed by Governor.
governance_structure: Metropolitan Transportation Authority operates under oversight of its Board of Directors (see NYC_GOID_BOD_002).

name: MTA Board of Directors
authorizing_authority: New York State Public Authorities Law § 1260
appointments_summary: Board consists of members appointed by Governor, Mayor, and other officials. Chair appointed by Governor.
governance_structure: Board of Directors for Metropolitan Transportation Authority; oversees MTA operations.

name: City University of New York
appointments_summary: Chancellor appointed by Board of Trustees.
governance_structure: City University of New York operates under oversight of its Board of Trustees (see NYC_GOID_BOT_001).

name: CUNY Board of Trustees
appointments_summary: Board consists of 17 members: 10 appointed by Governor, 5 by Mayor, 1 by each Borough President, plus student and faculty representatives. Chair selected by Board.
governance_structure: Board of Trustees for City University of New York; governs CUNY system and appoints Chancellor.

name: Brooklyn Public Library
appointments_summary: President and CEO selected by Board of Trustees.
governance_structure: Brooklyn Public Library operates under oversight of its Board of Trustees (see NYC_GOID_BOT_002).

name: Brooklyn Public Library Board of Trustees
name_alphabetized: Public Library Board of Trustees Brooklyn
appointments_summary: Board consists of members appointed by Mayor and Brooklyn Borough President. Chair selected by Board.
governance_structure: Board of Trustees for Brooklyn Public Library; governs library operations and selects President and CEO.
